exp._comment: Experience needed to level up each level. Use a function written in ruby to calculate the needed exp for the next level. See http://gamedev.stackexchange.com/questions/8965/how-to-implement-an-experience-system

functions.next_level_required_exp: def self._next_level_required_exp(next_level, exp_base = 30, exp_factor = 4); (exp_base + (next_level ** exp_factor)).round; end
